reviewText: Well worth the money! Both Videos are great. Video was just as advirtised. Blu Ray makes it that much better. Shipping was fast.

I bought this blu ray for my husband and he absolutely loves it.  I like it too, I'm not a huge snowmobiler but I loved seeing the beautiful mountains and the music was really cool.  I think the music is played by bands that are local to the area, as I had never heard of them before.  It was worth the money for sure, very entertaining!  Not a lot of blu rays out there like this.
